tool_description: Short ability to send and retrieve data from your EZ-ContactManager Account
name: EZ-ContactManager
title: EZ-ContactManager

api_list.name: Customer Add
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ez-contactmanager.p.rapidapi.com/contacts/add"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ez-contactmanager.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ez-contactmanager.p.rapidapi.com/contacts/add"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ez-contactmanager.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
